name: Beep (itch) (Telefrag Entertainment)
description:
This is a demo of the first level of Beep. I hope you enjoy it!

It's best played with a controller, but also supports keyboard.

How To Play
  • Left Stick / WASD: Move
  • A / Space: Jump 
  •  X / Shift: Slide 
  •  Start / Enter: Pause 
  •  Select / P: View Objectives

Join the Discord server to talk with other players and the developer!

https://discord.gg/npwRQukmhV
